passages.text:
You are standing in front of Assembly Hall in Bloomington.

[[Go to Memorial Stadium->Memorial Stadium]]
[[Walk to Wells library->Wells library]]
[[Drive to Kirkwood->Kirkwood Ave.]]
[[Leave IU campus->Leave Campus]]
passages.name: Assembly Hall

passages.text:
You are inside of Memorial Stadium. There is a football game that starts in 2 hours.

[[Go back to Assembly Hall->Assembly Hall]]
[[Wait for the game to start->Football Game]]

links.name: Wait for the game to start

passages.name: Memorial Stadium

passages.text:
You went to Wells Library to study.

[[Go back to Assembly Hall->Assembly Hall]]
passages.name: Wells library

passages.text:
You are on Kirkwood Ave., looking for a place to eat.

[[Eat at Five Guys->Five Guys]]
[[Eat at Goodfellas->Goodfellas]]
[[Eat at Jimmy Johns->Jimmy Johns]]
passages.name: Kirkwood Ave.

passages.text:
You have left campus and are on your way home. 

[[Change your mind and turn around->Assembly Hall]]

links.name: Change your mind and turn around

passages.name: Leave Campus

passages.text: You watched the game and IU won!
passages.name: Football Game

passages.text:
You are ordering at Five Guys. You are unsure what to get.

[[Get a cheeseburger->Cheeseburger]]
[[Get a milkshake->Milkshake]]
passages.name: Five Guys

passages.text: You got a slice of pepperoni pizza.
passages.name: Goodfellas

passages.text: You order a sub at jimmy johns and you are satisfied.
passages.name: Jimmy Johns

passages.text: The burger was tasty and you are satisfied.
passages.name: Cheeseburger

passages.text:
The milkshake was alright, but you are still hungry. You decide to go somewhere else to get more food.

[[Go to Goodfellas->Goodfellas]]
[[Go to Jimmy Johns->Jimmy Johns]]
passages.name: Milkshake
